author: Alana Mastrangelo, Alana Mastrangelo
title: Coronavirus: Italy's Death Toll Exceeds 16,000
description: Italy's overall death toll from the Chinese coronavirus exceeded 16,000 on Monday, as another 636 died from the disease in 24 hours.
content:
Italy’s overall death toll from the Chinese coronavirus exceeded 16,000 on Monday, as another 636 people have died from the disease in just the last 24 hours. Italian health officials, however, believe the nation has reached its “peak.”
